intro: Bilingual text helper: pick current language from ZH/EN blocks; supports anchor-based preset notes to reduce drift.

notes.content: PresetNote supports 3 ways to anchor: (1) matchRegex, (2) match (substring), (3) line fallback. occurrence selects the Nth hit, and offset adjusts the final line.
resolvePresetNoteLine prefers matchRegex → match → line. It clamps occurrence >= 1, applies offset, and drops out-of-range results to avoid invalid mappings.
buildPresetNoteMap resolves each note to a final line number and merges multiple notes on the same line by joining with a blank line.
